headline.main: The Road to a New Afghanistan

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''After Afghanistan'' (news analysis, front page, Nov. 21): I disagree with the statement that the Bush administration is conducting the war in Afghanistan ''under a doctrine in which the use of force is unrestrained by borders or allies.'' The current military action has and will be restrained by the need for a broad international alliance to fight terrorism.
abstract: Prof Ned Cabot says US military action in Afghanistan has and will be restrained by need for broad international alliance to fight terrorism (S)
